original_solution_mapping.L1: They played 15 rounds and William won 5 more rounds than Harry so that leaves 15 - 5 = <<15-5=10>>10 round
original_solution_mapping.L2: There are 2 players and 10 rounds so they each won 10/2 = 5 rounds
original_solution_mapping.L3: William won 5 more rounds than Harry and they each won 5 rounds so William won 5+5 = <<5+5=10>>10 rounds

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6869.
    Returns: the number of rounds William won.
    """
    # L1
    total_rounds = 15 # played 15 rounds of tic-tac-toe
    william_more_wins = 5 # William won 5 more rounds than Harry
    remaining_rounds = total_rounds - william_more_wins

    # L2
    num_players = 2 # There are 2 players
    rounds_per_player_equal_share = remaining_rounds / num_players

    # L3
    william_wins = rounds_per_player_equal_share + william_more_wins

    # FA
    answer = william_wins
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: They played {total_rounds} rounds and William won {william_more_wins} more rounds than Harry so that leaves {total_rounds} - {william_more_wins} = <<{total_rounds}-{william_more_wins}={remaining_rounds}>>{remaining_rounds} round
There are {num_players} players and {remaining_rounds} rounds so they each won {remaining_rounds}/{num_players} = {rounds_per_player_equal_share} rounds

William won {william_more_wins} more rounds than Harry and they each won {rounds_per_player_equal_share} rounds so William won {rounds_per_player_equal_share}+{william_more_wins} = <<{rounds_per_player_equal_share}+{william_more_wins}={william_wins}>>{william_wins} rounds

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: They played 15 rounds and William won 5 more rounds than Harry so that leaves 15 - 5 = <<15-5=10>>10 round
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: There are 10 players and 10 rounds so they each won 10/10 = 1 rounds
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: William won 5 more rounds than Harry and they each won 1 rounds so William won 1+5 = <<1+5=6>>6 rounds

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'remaining_rounds' (10) was used instead of 'num_players' (2).
